sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Typography, Box, List, ListItem } from '@mui/material'; const FormConfirmAddPlant = ({ plantInfo, setFormConfirmVisible, handleSubmit}) => { return ( Please confirm to add your new plant. Name: {plantInfo.name} Category: {plantInfo.category} Qty: {plantInfo.quantity} Size: {plantInfo.size} Description: {plantInfo.description} Price: ${plantInfo.price} Images {plantInfo.selectedFiles.map(file => {`${file.name.slice(0, 10)}...${file.name.slice(file.name.length - 4, file.name.length)}`} )} ) } export default FormConfirmAddPlant;
